channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Call for the English language development course in view of the C1 Advanced (CAE) exam - SOLD OUT
item.description: Registration is open for the English language development course with a view to sitting the Cambridge C1 Advanced (CAE) exam. Classes, for the whole duration of 20 hours, are taking place in person in February-March at the SLAM Centre according to the calendar reported in the call.%0A%0AðŸ“„ Read the call for further details
